channel.title: Hepl plz, my ::pnpc wont work, and im pretty sure the stuff is right

item.title: Hepl plz, my ::pnpc wont work, and im pretty sure the stuff is right
item.dc:creator: @Cancel Cancel
item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

[quote=“mehaku, post:3, topic:4996”]thx, mine did, but i was changing something in my script and the power went out, so it got all skrewed up, hmm, i added it and got, client.java:10295: 'else' without 'if' else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) ^ 1 error Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ne idea whats wrong?[/quote]

lmfao! dude, just take out else,

Nothing is wronge maybe get a new client.java file and editing that to your liking and it should be fine. Not a big deal though the server will still run, it is just telling you what errors it found while compiling.

item.title: Hepl plz, my ::pnpc wont work, and im pretty sure the stuff is right
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Heres mine - works perfectly.

} else if (command.startsWith("pnpc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); }

Use as ::pnpc #"); } }
